definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves

sentences.english: With no shoulder straps, they are designed for wearing with clothes that reveal the shoulders, such as halterneck tops.
sentences.chinese: 沒有肩帶，爲露肩式服裝而設計，比如吊帶衫。

sentences.english: Put a manhole cover on the tank top for removing filters and strainer.
sentences.chinese: 將井蓋的吊帶衫爲清除過濾器和過濾器。

sentences.english: She couldn't find her top in the chest of drawers .
sentences.chinese: 她在抽屜櫃裏找不到她的吊帶衫。

definition: lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
